comment: First of all, I think this is a pretty pointless class. However, it was easy. She was not very understanding though. I had to miss a class one day for work and she was pretty rude about it. She took off a letter grade from our average for every three missed class.

She was nice and her class was easy. I didn't really try and got an A. Though it wasn't a class I wanted the topics were interesting. Unfortunately when they came up we didn't really go over it.  She just didn't answer questions or expand on the books topic. At the end I still felt the class did nothing major for me.

I took this class in fall of 2006. I did not take it seriously at all and got through it with a B. While, I was not impressed with this class when I took it, I had no idea how it would change my life forever. I met my best friend who ended up helping me with my career, and also the woman I plan to marry in this class. My life is forever changed.

Easy A...just come to class, and do the reflection papers, and most definitely, participate. She's very strict re: attendance. She's very helpful and truly does care a lot about her students and their long-term goals.

Cares about her students, loves to joke around in class, very laid back and sometimes brings her 6-year old daughter to class. the Syllabus is her Bible and you MUST use it. textbook is required. Lots of "busy work" assignments, but nothing too hard. keep up with deadlines, and its an easy A

i have more work for this class than all my other classes combined, but i love her! READ THE SYLLABUS and come to class prepared! there is no excuse for not being prepared! participate in class, she really likes that! have fun with assignments and be creative! i want to take her psych 1101 class!

Her class was harder than you would expect a gened class. Does not like slackers or excuses. Attendance is mandatory. Syllabus changes often. There are easier teachers out there. She is nice, but has her favorites. Sometimes she singles people out. Stay on her good side, go to class, and READ THE SYLLABUS

Overall a good teacher. As long as you go to class and pay attention, you will do well on the quizzes and assignments. She has no sympathy for slackers, so don't expect anything if you don't do the assignments on time.

She's very smart and makes the class interesting. She may tell a few stories but it's nice to know that she's open with us. I recommend taking her class, especially if you're a girl. Girl Talk helps A LOTTT!
She is a very nice teacher and knows the material. Although she likes to talk she does cover everything you will have on the tests. I am looking forward to taking her for my psych class.
Great Person, Teacher, Advisor!!  You will definitely learn alot from her. All you have to do is pay attention and study!!  You'll do just fine!!
Easy Teacher, does not respond to emails. pop quizzes will move you from an a to b . overall good
For this Non-Traditional student, Dr Frazier is detailed & very informative.  You learn a lot to prepare you for college life.
She's an awesome professor. She's really nice and although she does get off topic she covers everything that will be on her tests. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
She is an awesome teacher. More busy work than anything else but if you study and do the work than you will be fine.

Super nice lady! Takes the class seriously, BUT it's not hard work, just a TON of busy work. most tests are fill in the blank but if you study a lot they are easy. take the class if you have time for the busy work!!

She is a really nice person and teacher. She just takes the class a little too seriously. We had to read two books, do a semester long photojournalism project, and take a mid term and a final exam. We also had to do a community engagement project. But she is really nice and although it is a lot of work, its all easy which is better. Take her A+++!!

She is nice.  Very into her class.  Probably takes this class too serious.  Test can be sometimes a little hard.  Usually fill-in-the-blank.  Also, does not give partcial credit.  So if you miss one part of a question, you miss the whole question.  Very strict, but nice over all.
The class is easy but she takes it way to seriously! She is the hardest teacher of this course.  The rest of them make it a lot easier!  Take any other teacher for KSU 1101.

This teacher gets way too into her class. Especially if you are in her KSU 1101. All the other KSU classes are much less difficult then this one. She is a good teacher I guess, it is just a shame that this class is required. You can only miss 4 classes without failing the class. The photojournalism project is really fun, if you are creative. Her te

If you are a creative person, take Frazier's class. One of your major grades is a photojournalism project that can be a lot of fun or a huge pain, depending on how academic you are. Don't expect to get anything back on time, it can take her all semester to grade something.

Kfrazier was really really nice. Sometimes her tests were hard but overall she is really nice. there is an attendance policy but you can miss like 4 classes. She seems to really care about students and is pretty tolerant of our crazy class. she takes ksu a little too seriously but overall this is an easy A! take her!
I love Dr. Frazier! She really loves her students and is so helpful. This class is an easy "A" as long as you follow directions and do your work.

She is a pretty cool lady. Believe it or not, she actually cares about her students. The material is boring but Mrs. Frazier makes it a lot of fun. She may or may not take late work, depending on if she likes you. But she is very helpful and fun.

she's a very nice teacher and is pretty easy.  we actually had a take home final!  but my only gripe is about the class, not her.  this class was a joke and a waste of my life.  at least she tried to make the material interesting...she's pretty hot too :p  i would guess that she's one of the best KSU 1101 teachers the school has.
She is so sweet, and very helpful! There is a lot of busy work in the class, but it's a required course and that's how they all are. She gives extra credit opportunities, and makes the class fun!
Took this class as an elective. Just show up for class do the work, and its an easy A. Ms. Frazier is very sweet and understanding.

She made this class a LOT of fun. Her tests aren't that hard at all, multiple choice and true/false. There are quite a few assignments and she expects you to put effort into them but her class is still a lot of fun. She is a high energy teacher and although she tends to talk a bit and you leave class late she's still awesome. I'd take her again.
She makes this boring class at least somewhat interesting. She's really nice & i would love to have her for a teacher again.
Easy class! She's super nice!

She gives a lot of busy work. We had to do a lot of assignments that do not really matter. Kind of a pointless class. She is nice, although she chooses favorites and expects a lot out of the students. She has good intentions but is a little annoying. Her tests/quizzes were a little difficult and in depth. We did not know what to expect.
Take her class. lots of fun
Easy assignments but there is a lot of them. Lots of busy work. She does not understand her own grading system. You will spend lots of time doing crap for this class.

Kim is a very nice teacher but, she requires her assignments to be very in depth.  The assignments are easy but need to have a lot of thought put into them.  She is utterly helpful.  I would recommend her to everyone.
No Comments
